# Review a Public Endpoint Topology

Objective:

Review a basic GCP public endpoint topology and explain
how exposure and traffic flow work.

You are reviewing a commonly used GCP web application
topology before any resources are created.

---
Requirements:

You must base your analysis strictly on the provided
architecture description.

The architecture represents a realistic production
public web application setup.

---
Task Requirements:

Edit the local file architecture-review.md and explain:

1. Which components are publicly exposed
2. Which components remain private
3. How user traffic flows from the internet to the application
4. Why this topology is appropriate for a basic public web app

---
Constraints:

Do NOT design a new topology
Do NOT introduce additional services
Do NOT propose improvements
Evaluate only what is described
Work fully offline and locally
